<main style="width: 30%">

### Application

All UESTCers are welcome to apply for joining the org. If you are interested in it, please refer to [our application guide](https://github.com/uestcer/community).
</main>

<main style="width: 30%">

### Communication

Join our [Gitter Channel](https://gitter.im/uestc-community/community) to get connected with each other.

</main>

<main style="width: 30%">

### Contribution

- Share your great pieces to help others;
- Use your inspiration and creativity to build up interesting sites and tools;
- Invite more UESTCers to apply for this org.
